I did a bunch of direct replies to people, but maybe it would be easier to just do one main post and hope people upvote it so more people see it.

**IF YOU'D LIKE TO KNOW WHEN THE EARLY SALES HAPPEN**
In January, there was a 4 day period where all the early skins went on sale together (Jan 22-25), but they only announced it the day it started.  I'm assuming this will happen every month.  If you're looking for the Feb Early Sales, it's likely coming up soon, so keep yours eyes open!  March ones will be sometime in March, and again, they will likely all be together, NOT slipped in to random weeks all sneaky-like.

Spread the word, happy (skin) hunting!

I don't get why they call it an early sale when its in the later half of the month... Rito pls

Thanks for clearing this up for so many people including myself.

It sounds confusing, but the 'early' part refers to how long the skin has been around.  They are early because the skins haven't been around for very long, and normally wouldn't be eligible for a sale, NOT that the sale is early in the month.

I would personally change the name to 'New Hotness' sales.  Get in touch Rito, I'm open to collabs.
